statements: UPDATE telecom_security SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE access_control SET access_level = 'ADMIN' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email='john.doe@example.com', password='newpassword123' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE users SET password = 'new_password', email = 'another_email@example.com', username = 'another_username' WHERE id = 2;
